title: A Blackletter/Roman Hybrid
content: Greater Albion Typefounders has released another of it's 'Evolutionary' faces at MyFonts.com. [Coronard](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014232204/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/gatf/coronard/) uses calligraphic detail toelaborate an underlying Roman serif form, and is a great way to combine ancient looks wih modern legibility.
author: Rasendyll

comments.content:
This is an interesting typeface. It reminds me of the calligraphy a friend of mine used to do. If you don't mind my asking, did you sketch out the letter forms or pen them.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~

[_...from the Fontry_](http://web.archive.org/web/20131014232204/http:/www.thefontry.com/)
THey were sketched out rather than drawn with a pen.
